name: Products
Netsis Stock json
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let stockCode = msg.payload.code

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `
    WITH A1 AS ( 
 SELECT
 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY KOD ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC )+3 SIRA,
 OLCUBIRIMI, KOD  
 FROM TBLSTBIRIM  WHERE KOD='${stockCode}'
 )
 
 SELECT 
    A.STOK_KODU,
    A.BARKOD,
    CASE 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 1 THEN B.OLCU_BR1 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 2 THEN B.OLCU_BR2
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 3 THEN B.OLCU_BR3
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 4 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 5 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI		
        ELSE NULL
    END AS OLCU_BIRIMI
FROM 
    TBLSTOKBAR A
LEFT JOIN 
    TBLSTSABIT B ON A.STOK_KODU = B.STOK_KODU
 LEFT JOIN A1 ON A1.KOD=B.STOK_KODU AND I_YEDEK1=A1.SIRA
WHERE 
    A.STOK_KODU = '${stockCode}';

`;

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
msg.query = query;

return msg;

name: BuyerAndSellerOrder
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let branchCode = env.get("BranchCode");
msg.flowName = msg.inregrationFlowData.flowName || "NTSBSO000V1.0";
// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let status_check_query='';
// url'den gelen verilerde kst var ise sorguya ekleniyor
let paramsOrderNumber = global.get('NTSBSO000V1reqOrderNumber')
if (paramsOrderNumber !== undefined && paramsOrderNumber !== null && paramsOrderNumber !== '') {

  
    status_check_query = ` AND SPTRA.FISNO= '${paramsOrderNumber}'`

}
let query = `
 WITH STBIRIM AS
  (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY KOD
                            ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC)+3 SIRA,
                       KOD,
                       OLCUBIRIMI,
                       PAY,
                       PAYDA
   FROM TBLSTBIRIM),
  
STATUS_CHECK AS (
    SELECT FISNO,
           CASE
               WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN SPTRA.STHAR_HTUR = 'K' THEN 1 END) = COUNT(*) THEN 'ISS'
               ELSE 'WAI'
           END AS overallStatus
    FROM TBLSIPATRA SPTRA
    WHERE  1=1   ${status_check_query ? status_check_query:'' }
    GROUP BY FISNO
)
SELECT SPTRA.FISNO	 AS docNum,
       DB_NAME() AS company,
       CASE SPMAS.FTIRSIP
           WHEN 6 THEN 'MS'
           WHEN 7 THEN 'SS'
       END documantTypeCode,
       SPMAS.TARIH createdOn,
        CONVERT(datetime, SPMAS.D_YEDEK10) OrderdeliveryDate,
        ISNULL( CONVERT(datetime, SPTRA.STHAR_TESTAR) , CONVERT(datetime, SPMAS.D_YEDEK10)) deliveryDate,
       SPTRA.SIRA itemNo,
       dbo.TRK(SPTRA.STOK_KODU) productCode, --SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT AS quantity ,
 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
      WHEN 0 THEN SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT
     WHEN 1 THEN SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT
     ELSE (STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT)*CEVRIM
 END AS quantity,

 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
     WHEN 0 THEN ST.OLCU_BR1
     WHEN 1 THEN ST.OLCU_BR1
     WHEN 2 THEN ST.OLCU_BR2
     WHEN 3 THEN ST.OLCU_BR3
     WHEN 4 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
     WHEN 5 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
 END AS unit,
    CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  6
 THEN  SPMAS.CARI_KODU ELSE NULL END soldTo,
 
 CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  7
 THEN  SPMAS.CARI_KODU ELSE NULL END  boughtFrom,
     CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  6
 THEN  SPTRA.DEPO_KODU  ELSE NULL END pickFrom,
 
 CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  7
 THEN  SPTRA.DEPO_KODU  ELSE NULL END  putAwayTo,   
    CASE SPTRA.EKALAN_NEDEN WHEN 1 THEN dbo.TRK(EKALAN)
   ELSE dbo.TRK(ST.STOK_ADI) END  AS DefinitionLang,
     SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK AS baseQuantity,
    ST.OLCU_BR1 AS baseUnit,
    SPMAS.CARI_KOD2 AS shipTo,
    
	
	CASE WHEN SPTRA.STHAR_HTUR ='K' THEN 'ISS'
	ELSE 'WAI' END [status],
	STATUS_CHECK.overallStatus,
     ST.KOD_1,
     SPEK.KT_PLAKA_6 PLAKA ,
	 SPEK.KT_ROOTADI_6 ROOTADI,	 
	 SPEK.KT_SEVK_NOT_6 SEVK_NOT, 
	 SPEK.KT_SOFOR_6 SOFOR,
     SPEK.KT_TASIYICIVKN_6 TASIYICIVKN,
     SPEK.KT_TASIYICI_ADI_6 TASIYICIADI,
     EK.ACIK1

	 
	
FROM TBLSIPAMAS SPMAS
LEFT JOIN  TBLFATUEK EK ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO=EK.FATIRSNO AND SPMAS.FTIRSIP=EK.FKOD
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPATRA SPTRA ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO = SPTRA.FISNO
LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABIT ST ON ST.STOK_KODU=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
LEFT JOIN STBIRIM BRM ON BRM.KOD=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
AND ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)=BRM.SIRA
JOIN STATUS_CHECK ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO = STATUS_CHECK.FISNO
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK SPEK ON SPEK.FATIRS_NO=SPMAS.FATIRS_NO AND SPEK.CARI_KODU=SPMAS.CARI_KODU AND SPEK.FTIRSIP=SPMAS.FTIRSIP
WHERE SPMAS.SUBE_KODU IN  ('-1', '${branchCode}')     
`;

 



  



  
if (paramsOrderNumber !== undefined && paramsOrderNumber !== null && paramsOrderNumber !== '') {

  query += `AND SPMAS.FATIRS_NO= '${paramsOrderNumber}'`
}

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle

msg.query = query;
if (global.get('NTSBSO000V1reqOrderNumber')) {
  global.set('NTSBSO000V1reqOrderNumber', null)
}



 



 

return msg;

-- Create the trigger
alter   TRIGGER S4IN_CustomerChanges
ON TBLCASABIT
for      INSERT, UPDATE,DELETE NOT FOR REPLICATION
AS

 BEGIN
  


     DECLARE @datakey VARCHAR(MAX),
			 @datatypel VARCHAR(50),			
	         @proc VARCHAR(50),
			 @msg VARCHAR(255),
			 @status INT;  
    
       SET @datatypel =(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_SyncTableType WHERE Name='TBLCASABIT');	

	    -- Cursor tanmlama
    DECLARE customer_cursor CURSOR FOR 
    SELECT INSERTED.CARI_KOD, CASE 
                          WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DELETED WHERE DELETED.CARI_KOD = INSERTED.CARI_KOD) THEN 1
                          WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSERTED) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DELETED) THEN 0
                          WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSERTED) THEN -1
                      END AS OperationType
    FROM INSERTED
    FULL OUTER JOIN DELETED
    ON INSERTED.CARI_KOD = DELETED.CARI_KOD;

	 -- Cursor kullanm
    OPEN customer_cursor;
    FETCH NEXT FROM customer_cursor INTO @datakey, @status;

	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    BEGIN
    	 
		 IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC WHERE Datakey=@datakey and DataTypeID=@datatypel)
		BEGIN 
		 BEGIN TRY
				UPDATE S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC SET 
				Synctime=NULL,
				  ProcedureID = CASE
                    WHEN @status = -1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'DELETE')
                    WHEN @status = 0 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'UPDATE')
					WHEN @status = 1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'INSERT')
                END
				WHERE Datakey=@datakey  and DataTypeID=@datatypel
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
				UPDATE S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC SET 
				Synctime=GETDATE(),
				ProcedureID=(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name='ERROR'),
				ErrorInfo=ERROR_MESSAGE()
				WHERE Datakey=@datakey  and DataTypeID=@datatypel
		END CATCH;
		
		END

	ELSE --kayt yok ise insert et StockChangeLog Tabloya 
		BEGIN 
		 BEGIN TRY

				INSERT INTO S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC (Datakey, DataTypeID, Synctime, ProcedureID)
				VALUES (
					@datakey,			--stock codeu
					@datatypel,       -- Hangi tablonun trigger' olduunu belirtir
					CASE WHEN @status =-1 THEN GETDATE() ELSE NULL END, 
					 CASE
                    WHEN @status = -1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'DELETE')
                    WHEN @status = 0 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'UPDATE')
                    ELSE (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'INSERT')
                END         --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID 
				);
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
					INSERT INTO S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC (Datakey, DataTypeID, Synctime,ProcedureID, ErrorInfo)
					VALUES (
						@datakey, 
						@datatypel,       -- Rastgele bir GUID deeri
						GETDATE(),
						(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name='ERROR'), --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID 
						ERROR_MESSAGE() -- Hata mesajn ErrorInfo kolonuna ekler
					);
		END CATCH;

		END

		  FETCH NEXT FROM customer_cursor INTO @datakey, @status;
	END
     CLOSE customer_cursor;
    DEALLOCATE customer_cursor;
END;

ALTER  TRIGGER S4IN_OrderChanges
on TBLSIPAMAS 
FOR   INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE   NOT FOR REPLICATION
AS
BEGIN

     DECLARE @datakey VARCHAR(50),
			 @datatypel VARCHAR(50),			
	         @proc VARCHAR(50),
			 @msg VARCHAR(255)	,
			 @status INT;  
    
    
	 
    SET @datatypel =(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_SyncTableType WHERE Name='TBLSIPAMAS');
	 


	  			  DECLARE order_cursor CURSOR FOR 
    SELECT INSERTED.FATIRS_NO, CASE 
                          WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DELETED WHERE DELETED.FATIRS_NO = INSERTED.FATIRS_NO) THEN 1
                          WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSERTED) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DELETED) THEN 0
                          WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSERTED) THEN -1
                      END AS OperationType
    FROM INSERTED
    FULL OUTER JOIN DELETED
    ON INSERTED.FATIRS_NO = DELETED.FATIRS_NO;

 	 -- Cursor kullanm
    OPEN order_cursor;
    FETCH NEXT FROM order_cursor INTO @datakey, @status;

	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    BEGIN
    
    IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC WHERE Datakey=@datakey  and DataTypeID=@datatypel)
		BEGIN 
		
		 BEGIN TRY
				UPDATE S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC SET 
				Synctime=NULL,
				 ProcedureID = CASE
                    WHEN @status = -1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'DELETE')
                    WHEN @status = 0 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'UPDATE')
					-- WHEN @status = 1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'INSERT')
					ELSE 1 
                END
				WHERE Datakey=@datakey  and DataTypeID=@datatypel
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
				UPDATE S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC SET 
				Synctime=GETDATE(),
				ProcedureID=(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name='ERROR'),
				ErrorInfo=ERROR_MESSAGE()
				WHERE Datakey=@datakey  and DataTypeID=@datatypel
		END CATCH;
		END
	 ELSE IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC WHERE Datakey=@datakey AND @status=1)
	 BEGIN 
	 -- SPARLERN TOPLAM SAYFASINDA TAMAM BUNTONU UPDATE TRIGGER TETIKLENIYOR
	 RETURN;
	 END
	ELSE --kayt yok ise insert et StockChangeLog Tabloya 
		BEGIN 
		 BEGIN TRY
				INSERT INTO S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC (Datakey, DataTypeID, Synctime, ProcedureID)
				VALUES (
					@datakey,			--stock codeu
					@datatypel,       -- Hangi tablonun trigger' olduunu belirtir
					CASE WHEN @status =-1 THEN GETDATE() ELSE NULL END, 
					 CASE
                    WHEN @status = -1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'DELETE')
                    WHEN @status = 0 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'UPDATE')
                    ELSE (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'INSERT')
                END         --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID      
				);
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
					INSERT INTO S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC (Datakey, DataTypeID, Synctime,ProcedureID, ErrorInfo)
					VALUES (
						@datakey, 
						@datatypel,       -- Rastgele bir GUID deeri
						GETDATE(),
						(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name='ERROR'), --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID 
						ERROR_MESSAGE() -- Hata mesajn ErrorInfo kolonuna ekler
					);
		END CATCH;

		END

     FETCH NEXT FROM order_cursor INTO @datakey, @status;
	 END

	  CLOSE order_cursor;
    DEALLOCATE order_cursor;
END;

                    WHEN @status = -1 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'DELETE')
                    WHEN @status = 0 THEN (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'UPDATE')
                    ELSE (SELECT ID FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name = 'INSERT')
                END         --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID      
				);
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
					INSERT INTO S4IN_INTEGRATION_SYNC (Datakey, DataTypeID, Synctime,ProcedureID, ErrorInfo)
					VALUES (
						@datakey, 
						@datatypel,       -- Rastgele bir GUID deeri
						GETDATE(),
						(SELECT ID  FROM S4IN_ProcedureType WHERE Name='ERROR'), --S4IN_ProcedureType TABLOSUNDAN INSERT ID 
						ERROR_MESSAGE() -- Hata mesajn ErrorInfo kolonuna ekler
					);
		END CATCH;

		END

     FETCH NEXT FROM ProductionDoc_cursor INTO @datakey, @status;
	 END

	  CLOSE ProductionDoc_cursor;
    DEALLOCATE ProductionDoc_cursor;
END;

func:
let stockCode = msg.item[0].data[0].code


// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `
    WITH A1 AS ( 
 SELECT
 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY KOD ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC )+3 SIRA,
 OLCUBIRIMI, KOD  
 FROM TBLSTBIRIM  WHERE KOD='${stockCode}'
 )
 
 SELECT 
    A.STOK_KODU,
    A.BARKOD,
    CASE 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 1 THEN B.OLCU_BR1 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 2 THEN B.OLCU_BR2
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 3 THEN B.OLCU_BR3
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 4 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 5 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI		
        ELSE NULL
    END AS OLCU_BIRIMI
FROM 
    TBLSTOKBAR A
LEFT JOIN 
    TBLSTSABIT B ON A.STOK_KODU = B.STOK_KODU
 LEFT JOIN A1 ON A1.KOD=B.STOK_KODU AND I_YEDEK1=A1.SIRA
WHERE 
    A.STOK_KODU = '${stockCode}';

`;

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
msg.query = query;

return msg;

           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD1,
       CASE 
           WHEN BARKOD2 IS NOT NULL AND BARKOD2 <> '' THEN BARKOD2
           WHEN OLCU_BR2 IS NOT NULL AND OLCU_BR2 <> '' THEN CONCAT(A.STOK_KODU, OLCU_BR2)
           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD2,
       CASE 
           WHEN BARKOD3 IS NOT NULL AND BARKOD3 <> '' THEN BARKOD3
           WHEN OLCU_BR3 IS NOT NULL AND OLCU_BR3 <> '' THEN CONCAT(A.STOK_KODU, OLCU_BR3)
           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD3,
       B.TUR,

	   A.KOD_5

LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABITEK B ON A.STOK_KODU = B.STOK_KODU

`;

BuyerAndSellerOrder
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let branchCode = env.get("BranchCode");
msg.flowName = msg.inregrationFlowData.flowName || "NTSBSO000V1.0";
// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let status_check_query='';
// url'den gelen verilerde kst var ise sorguya ekleniyor
let paramsOrderNumber = msg.sipmas_DataKey;
if (paramsOrderNumber !== undefined && paramsOrderNumber !== null && paramsOrderNumber !== '') {

  
    status_check_query = ` AND SPTRA.FISNO= '${paramsOrderNumber}'`

}
let query = `
 WITH STBIRIM AS
  (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY KOD
                            ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC)+3 SIRA,
                       KOD,
                       OLCUBIRIMI,
                       PAY,
                       PAYDA
   FROM TBLSTBIRIM),
  
STATUS_CHECK AS (
    SELECT FISNO,
           CASE
               WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN SPTRA.STHAR_HTUR = 'K' THEN 1 END) = COUNT(*) THEN 'ISS'
               ELSE 'WAI'
           END AS overallStatus
    FROM TBLSIPATRA SPTRA
    WHERE  1=1   ${status_check_query ? status_check_query:'' }
    GROUP BY FISNO
)
SELECT SPTRA.FISNO	 AS docNum,
       DB_NAME() AS company,
       CASE SPMAS.FTIRSIP
           WHEN 6 THEN 'MS'
           WHEN 7 THEN 'SS'
       END documantTypeCode,
       SPMAS.TARIH createdOn,
         SPMAS.D_YEDEK10 OrderdeliveryDate,
        ISNULL(SPTRA.STHAR_TESTAR ,SPMAS.D_YEDEK10) deliveryDate,
       SPTRA.SIRA itemNo,
       dbo.TRK(SPTRA.STOK_KODU) productCode, --SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT AS quantity ,
 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
      WHEN 0 THEN SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT
     WHEN 1 THEN SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT
     ELSE (STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT)*CEVRIM
 END AS quantity,
 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
     WHEN 0 THEN ST.OLCU_BR1
     WHEN 1 THEN ST.OLCU_BR1
     WHEN 2 THEN ST.OLCU_BR2
     WHEN 3 THEN ST.OLCU_BR3
     WHEN 4 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
     WHEN 5 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
 END AS unit,
    CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  6
 THEN  SPMAS.CARI_KODU ELSE NULL END soldTo,
 
 CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  7
 THEN  SPMAS.CARI_KODU ELSE NULL END  boughtFrom,
     CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  6
 THEN  SPTRA.DEPO_KODU  ELSE NULL END pickFrom,
 
 CASE SPTRA.STHAR_FTIRSIP  WHEN  7
 THEN  SPTRA.DEPO_KODU  ELSE NULL END  putAwayTo,   
    CASE SPTRA.EKALAN_NEDEN WHEN 1 THEN dbo.TRK(EKALAN)
   ELSE dbo.TRK(ST.STOK_ADI) END  AS DefinitionLang,
     SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK AS baseQuantity,
    ST.OLCU_BR1 AS baseUnit,
    SPMAS.CARI_KOD2 AS shipTo,
    
	
	CASE WHEN SPTRA.STHAR_HTUR ='K' THEN 'ISS'
	ELSE 'WAI' END [status],
	STATUS_CHECK.overallStatus,
     ST.KOD_1,
     SPEK.KT_PLAKA_6 PLAKA ,
	 SPEK.KT_ROOTADI_6 ROOTADI,
	 
	 SPEK.KT_SEVK_NOT_6 SEVK_NOT, 
	 SPEK.KT_SOFOR_6 SOFOR,
       SPEK.KT_TASIYICIVKN_6 TASIYICIVKN,
     SPEK.KT_TASIYICI_ADI_6 TASIYICIADI,
     EK.ACIK1
	
FROM TBLSIPAMAS SPMAS
LEFT JOIN  TBLFATUEK EK ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO=EK.FATIRSNO AND SPMAS.FTIRSIP=EK.FKOD
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPATRA SPTRA ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO = SPTRA.FISNO
LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABIT ST ON ST.STOK_KODU=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
LEFT JOIN STBIRIM BRM ON BRM.KOD=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
AND ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)=BRM.SIRA
JOIN STATUS_CHECK ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO = STATUS_CHECK.FISNO
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK SPEK ON SPEK.FATIRS_NO=SPMAS.FATIRS_NO AND SPEK.CARI_KODU=SPMAS.CARI_KODU AND SPEK.FTIRSIP=SPMAS.FTIRSIP
WHERE SPMAS.SUBE_KODU IN  ('-1', '${branchCode}')     
`;

 



  
if (paramsOrderNumber !== undefined && paramsOrderNumber !== null && paramsOrderNumber !== '') {
   
  query += `AND SPMAS.FATIRS_NO= '${paramsOrderNumber}'`
    status_check_query = ` AND SPTRA.FISNO= '${paramsOrderNumber}'`

}

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
//node.warn(query);
msg.query = query;



 

return msg;

const utcNow = new Date(Date.now() + (3 * 60 * 60 * 1000));

    },
   
    Kalems: [
        {
            StokKodu: null,

            STra_TAR: formattedDate,
            STra_NF: 0,

            STra_SatIsk6:null,
            STra_ODEGUN:null,
            SatirBaziAciks:null,
            S_Yedek2:'NODE-RED'
            
        },
    ],
};

// null veya undefined kontrol iin yardmc fonksiyon
const getValueOrDefault = (value, defaultValue) =>
    value !== null && value !== undefined ? value : defaultValue;

// Gelen payload zerinde ilem yapyoruz
const incomingData = msg.payload.data || {}; // Gelen veri yoksa bo bir nesne olarak balat

const result = {
     // gelen post istein itemlerin says
    KalemAdedi:msg.netsisDataPayload.Kalems.length,
    FaturaTip: 2,
    SonNumaraYazilsin: true,
    OtomatikCevrimYapilsin: true,
    FatUst: {},
    EIrsEkBilgi: {},
    Kalems: []
    
};

// FatUst alanlarn doldur
const fatUstData = incomingData.FatUst || {}; // Gelen FatUst yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.FatUst) {
    result.FatUst[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        fatUstData[key],
        defaultValue.FatUst[key]
    );
}

// EIrsEkBilgi alanlarn doldur
const eIrsEkBilgiData = incomingData.EIrsEkBilgi || {}; // Gelen EIrsEkBilgi yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.EIrsEkBilgi) {
    result.EIrsEkBilgi[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        eIrsEkBilgiData[key],
        defaultValue.EIrsEkBilgi[key]
    );
}

// Kalemler iin zel ilem
const kalemlerData = incomingData.Kalems || []; // Gelen Kalems yoksa bo dizi kullan
result.Kalems = kalemlerData.map((kalem) => {
    const defaultKalem = defaultValue.Kalems[0];
    const processedKalem = {};
    for (const key in defaultKalem) {
        processedKalem[key] = getValueOrDefault(kalem[key], defaultKalem[key]);
    }
    return processedKalem;
});

 
msg.dataPayload = result;
msg.dataPayload.FatUst.FATIRS_NO=null;
msg.flowName="S2N_RECEVING_URL"
return msg;

const utcNow = new Date(Date.now() + (3 * 60 * 60 * 1000));

    },
    EIrsEkBilgi: {
        PLAKA: null,
        TASIYICIVKN: null,
        TASIYICIADI: null,
        TASIYICIILCE: null,

        SOFOR1SOYADI: null,

        DORSEPLAKA3: null,
        MATBUKULLANILSIN: false,
    },
   
    Kalems: [
        {
            StokKodu: null,
            Sira: 1,
            STra_FATIRSNO: null,
            STra_GCMIK: 0,
            STra_TAR: formattedDate,
            STra_NF: 0,
            STra_BF: 0,
            STra_KDV: 0,
            DOVIZ_TURU:null,
            DOVTIP:null,
            STra_DOVTIP:0,
            STra_HTUR: "H",
            STra_SIPNUM: null,
            Plasiyer_Kodu: null,
            Ekalanneden: null,
            Ekalan: null,
            Ekalan1: null,
            STra_testar: formattedDate,
            Olcubr: 1,

            STra_SatIsk5:null,
            STra_SatIsk6:null,
            STra_ODEGUN:null,
            SatirBaziAciks:null
            
        },
    ],
};

// null veya undefined kontrol iin yardmc fonksiyon
const getValueOrDefault = (value, defaultValue) =>
    value !== null && value !== undefined ? value : defaultValue;

// Gelen payload zerinde ilem yapyoruz
const incomingData = msg.payload.data || {}; // Gelen veri yoksa bo bir nesne olarak balat

const result = {
     // gelen post istein itemlerin says
    KalemAdedi:msg.netsisDataPayload.Kalems.length,
    FaturaTip: 2,
    SonNumaraYazilsin: true,
    OtomatikCevrimYapilsin: true,
    FatUst: {},
    EIrsEkBilgi: {},
    Kalems: []
    
};

// FatUst alanlarn doldur
const fatUstData = incomingData.FatUst || {}; // Gelen FatUst yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.FatUst) {
    result.FatUst[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        fatUstData[key],
        defaultValue.FatUst[key]
    );
}

// EIrsEkBilgi alanlarn doldur
const eIrsEkBilgiData = incomingData.EIrsEkBilgi || {}; // Gelen EIrsEkBilgi yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.EIrsEkBilgi) {
    result.EIrsEkBilgi[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        eIrsEkBilgiData[key],
        defaultValue.EIrsEkBilgi[key]
    );
}

// Kalemler iin zel ilem
const kalemlerData = incomingData.Kalems || []; // Gelen Kalems yoksa bo dizi kullan
result.Kalems = kalemlerData.map((kalem) => {
    const defaultKalem = defaultValue.Kalems[0];
    const processedKalem = {};
    for (const key in defaultKalem) {
        processedKalem[key] = getValueOrDefault(kalem[key], defaultKalem[key]);
    }
    return processedKalem;
});

 
msg.dataPayload = result;
msg.dataPayload.FatUst.FATIRS_NO=null;
msg.flowName="S2N_RECEVING_URL"
return msg;

        FIYATTARIHI: formattedDate,

        FAT_ALTM1:null,

        GEN_ISK2T:null,
        GEN_ISK3T: null,
        GEN_ISK1O: null,
        GEN_ISK2O: null,
        GEN_ISK3O: null
    },
    Kalems: [
        {
            StokKodu: null,
            Sira: 1,
            STra_FATIRSNO: null,
            STra_GCMIK: 0,
            STra_TAR: formattedDate,
            STra_NF: 0,
            STra_BF: 0,
            STra_KDV: 0,
            DOVIZ_TURU:null,
            DOVTIP:null,
            STra_DOVTIP:0,
            STra_HTUR: "H",
            STra_SIPNUM: null,
            Plasiyer_Kodu: null,
            Ekalanneden: null,
            Ekalan: null,
            Ekalan1: null,
            STra_testar: formattedDate,
            Olcubr: 1,
            ProjeKodu: null,
            STra_FTIRSIP: null,
            STra_CARI_KOD: null,
            STra_GC: "C",
            DEPO_KODU: 0,
            STra_ACIK: null,
            TesMik: 0,
            Stra_FiiliTar: formattedDate,
            D_YEDEK10: formattedDate,
            STra_SIPKONT:null,
            Stra_IrsKont:null,
            Firmadovtut:0,
            STra_SatIsk:null,
            STra_SatIsk2:null,
            STra_SatIsk3:null,
            STra_SatIsk4:null,
            STra_SatIsk5:null,
            STra_SatIsk6:null,
            STra_ODEGUN:null,
            SatirBaziAciks:null,
            S_Yedek2:'SFORIN'
            
        },
    ],
};

// null veya undefined kontrol iin yardmc fonksiyon
const getValueOrDefault = (value, defaultValue) =>
    value !== null && value !== undefined ? value : defaultValue;

// Gelen payload zerinde ilem yapyoruz
const incomingData = msg.payload_netsis.data || {}; // Gelen veri yoksa bo bir nesne olarak balat

const result = {
     // gelen post istein itemlerin says
    KalemAdedi:msg.netsisDataPayload.Kalems.length,
    FaturaTip: 0,
    SonNumaraYazilsin: true,
    OtomatikCevrimYapilsin: true,
    FiyatSistemineGoreHesapla: false,
    FatUst: {},
    EIrsEkBilgi: {},
    Kalems: []
    
};

// FatUst alanlarn doldur
const fatUstData = incomingData.FatUst || {}; // Gelen FatUst yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.FatUst) {
    result.FatUst[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        fatUstData[key],
        defaultValue.FatUst[key]
    );
}

// Kalemler iin zel ilem
const kalemlerData = incomingData.Kalems || []; // Gelen Kalems yoksa bo dizi kullan
result.Kalems = kalemlerData.map((kalem) => {
    const defaultKalem = defaultValue.Kalems[0];
    const processedKalem = {};
    for (const key in defaultKalem) {
        processedKalem[key] = getValueOrDefault(kalem[key], defaultKalem[key]);
    }
    return processedKalem;
});

 
msg.dataPayload = result;

msg.flowName="S2N_RECEVING_URL"
return msg;

MssqlFatUst
info:
CREATE FUNCTION IS_EINVOICE_CUSTOMER (@CARI_KOD NVARCHAR(50))
RETURNS BIT
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @Result BIT;

    IF EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM NETSIS..TBLEFATCARI A    WITH (NOLOCK) 
        LEFT JOIN TBLCASABIT B WITH (NOLOCK) 
            ON A.IDENTIFIER = B.VERGI_NUMARASI 
        WHERE B.CARI_KOD = @CARI_KOD 
          AND A.AKTIF = 'E'
    )
    BEGIN
        SET @Result = 1; -- Kayt varsa TRUE (1)
    END
    ELSE
    BEGIN
        SET @Result = 0; -- Kayt yoksa FALSE (0)
    END

    RETURN @Result;
END


SELECT dbo.IS_EINVOICE_CUSTOMER('644') AS KAYIT_VAR_MI;

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `SELECT
    A.CARI_KODU,
    A.KOD1,
    A.KOD2,
    A.TARIH,
    A.ODEMETARIHI,
    A.SIPARIS_TEST,
    A.D_YEDEK10,
    A.DOVBAZTAR,
    fek.ACIK1, fek.ACIK2, fek.ACIK3, fek.ACIK4, fek.ACIK5,
    fek.ACIK6, fek.ACIK7, fek.ACIK8, fek.ACIK9, fek.ACIK10,
    fek.ACIK11, fek.ACIK12, fek.ACIK13, fek.ACIK14, fek.ACIK15, fek.ACIK16,
    A.PROJE_KODU,
    A.GEN_ISK1T, a.GEN_ISK2T, a.GEN_ISK3T,
    A.GEN_ISK1O, a.GEN_ISK2O, a.GEN_ISK3O,
    DOVIZ_TIPI,
    A.KDV,
    A.FAT_ALTM2,
    A.FAT_ALTM1,
    A.ODEMEGUNU,
    ISNULL(a.PLA_KODU, cs.PLASIYER_KODU) AS PLASIYER_KODU,
    ek.KT_PLAKA_6 AS TASIYICI_PLAKA,    
    A.CARI_KOD2,  
    ISNULL(ek.KT_SOFOR_6,NULL) AS TASIYICI_SOFORADI,
    ISNULL(ek.KT_SOFOR2_6,NULL) AS TASIYICI2_SOFORADI,
	ISNULL(ek.KT_SOFOR3_6,NULL) AS TASIYIC3I_SOFORADI,
    ek.KT_TASIYICI_ADI_6 AS TASICI_ADI,
	ISNULL(ek.KT_TASIYICIVKN_6,NULL) TASIYICI_VKN,
    ek.KT_TC_SOFOR_6 AS TCSOFOR,
    ek.KT_TC_SOFOR_2_6 AS TCSOFOR2,
	ek.KT_TC_SOFOR_3_6 AS TCSOFOR3,
   ISNULL(ek.KT_PALET_6, FLOOR(  (
 SELECT SUM(
 SP.STHAR_GCMIK * 
    CASE 
        WHEN S.OLCU_BR1 = 'PL' THEN 1.0
        WHEN S.OLCU_BR2 = 'PL' THEN CAST(S.PAY_1 AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(S.PAYDA_1 AS FLOAT), 0)
        WHEN S.OLCU_BR3 = 'PL' THEN CAST(S.PAY2 AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(S.PAYDA2 AS FLOAT), 0)
        WHEN B.OLCUBIRIMI='PL' THEN  CAST(B.PAY AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(B.PAYDA AS FLOAT), 0)     
		ELSE 0
    END) AS CarpanliMiktar
FROM TBLSIPATRA SP 
LEFT JOIN TBLSTBIRIM B ON B.KOD =SP.STOK_KODU
LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABIT S  ON S.STOK_KODU=SP.STOK_KODU
 WHERE SP.FISNO=A.FATIRS_NO))) AS PL_ADET
  ,CS.ISKONTO_ORANI
  ,cs.GRUP_KODU
  ,A.EXPORTTYPE   
FROM TBLSIPAMAS A
JOIN TBLCASABIT cs ON a.CARI_KODU = cs.CARI_KOD
JOIN TBLFATUEK fek ON fek.FATIRSNO = a.FATIRS_NO AND fek.CKOD = a.CARI_KODU AND fek.FKOD = 6
JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK ek ON ek.FATIRS_NO = a.FATIRS_NO AND ek.CARI_KODU = a.CARI_KODU 
WHERE A.FATIRS_NO='${msg.orderNumber}' AND  A.FTIRSIP=6 and A.CARI_KODU='${msg.orderCustomerCode}'
 
`;


msg.query = query;

return msg;

        MATBUKULLANILSIN: false,
    },
    Kalems: [
        {
            STra_HTUR: "H",
            STra_GC: "G",
            StokKodu: null,
            Sira: 0,
            STra_IAF: 1,
            STra_FATIRSNO: null,
            STra_GCMIK: 0,
            STra_TAR: originalDate || formattedDate,
            STra_NF: 0,
            STra_BF: 0,
            STra_KDV: 0,
            DOVIZ_TURU: 0,
            DOVTIP: 0,
            STra_DOVTIP: 0,
            STra_SIPNUM: null,
            Plasiyer_Kodu: "MERKEZ",
            STra_testar: originalDate || formattedDate,
            Olcubr: 1,
            ProjeKodu: null,
            DEPO_KODU: 0,
            Stra_FiiliTar: originalDate || formattedDate,
            D_YEDEK10: originalDate || formattedDate,
            STra_SIPKONT: null,
            Stra_IrsKont: 1,
            Firmadovtut: 0,
            STra_SatIsk: null,
            STra_SatIsk2: null,
            STra_SatIsk3: null,
            STra_SatIsk4: null,
            STra_SatIsk5: null,
            STra_SatIsk6: null,
            STra_ODEGUN: null,
            SatirBaziAciks: null,
            S_Yedek2: 'SFORIN'


        },
    ],
};

// null veya undefined kontrol iin yardmc fonksiyon
const getValueOrDefault = (value, defaultValue) =>
    value !== null && value !== undefined ? value : defaultValue;

// Gelen payload zerinde ilem yapyoruz
const incomingData = msg.netsisDataPayload || {}; // Gelen veri yoksa bo bir nesne olarak balat

const result = {
    KalemAdedi: msg.netsisDataPayload.Kalems.length,
    FaturaTip: 3,
    KosulMalFazlasiIsle: true,
    SonNumaraYazilsin: true,
    OtomatikCevrimYapilsin: true,
    FatUst: {},
    Kalems: [],
    EIrsEkBilgi: defaultValue.EIrsEkBilgi

};






// FatUst alanlarn doldur
const fatUstData = incomingData.FatUst || {}; // Gelen FatUst yoksa bo nesne kullan
for (const key in defaultValue.FatUst) {

    result.FatUst[key] = getValueOrDefault(
        fatUstData[key],
        defaultValue.FatUst[key]
    );
}



// Kalemler iin zel ilem
const kalemlerData = incomingData.Kalems || []; // Gelen Kalems yoksa bo dizi kullan
const defaultKalem = defaultValue.Kalems[0];
result.Kalems = kalemlerData.map((kalem) => {
    defaultValue.Kalems[0].Sira += 1
    const processedKalem = {};
    for (const key in defaultKalem) {
        processedKalem[key] = getValueOrDefault(kalem[key], defaultKalem[key]);
    }
    return processedKalem;
});

msg.dataPayload = result;

msg.flowName = "STNRDN000V1.0"
return msg;

name: MssqlFatUst
info:
CREATE FUNCTION IS_EINVOICE_CUSTOMER (@CARI_KOD NVARCHAR(50))
RETURNS BIT
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @Result BIT;

    IF EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM NETSIS..TBLEFATCARI A    WITH (NOLOCK) 
        LEFT JOIN TBLCASABIT B WITH (NOLOCK) 
            ON A.IDENTIFIER = B.VERGI_NUMARASI 
        WHERE B.CARI_KOD = @CARI_KOD 
          AND A.AKTIF = 'E'
    )
    BEGIN
        SET @Result = 1; -- Kayt varsa TRUE (1)
    END
    ELSE
    BEGIN
        SET @Result = 0; -- Kayt yoksa FALSE (0)
    END

    RETURN @Result;
END


SELECT dbo.IS_EINVOICE_CUSTOMER('644') AS KAYIT_VAR_MI;

msg.flowName =  "DocumentViewPLQuantity";
 
// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = ` 
 
 WITH A1 AS
  (SELECT
     (SELECT SUM(SP.STHAR_GCMIK * CASE
                                      WHEN S.OLCU_BR1 = 'PL' THEN 1.0
                                      WHEN S.OLCU_BR2 = 'PL' THEN CAST(S.PAY_1 AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(S.PAYDA_1 AS FLOAT), 0)
                                      WHEN S.OLCU_BR3 = 'PL' THEN CAST(S.PAY2 AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(S.PAYDA2 AS FLOAT), 0)
                                      WHEN B.OLCUBIRIMI='PL' THEN CAST(B.PAY AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(B.PAYDA AS FLOAT), 0)
                                      ELSE 0
                                  END) AS CarpanliMiktar
      FROM TBLSIPATRA SP
      LEFT JOIN TBLSTBIRIM B ON B.KOD =SP.STOK_KODU
      LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABIT S ON S.STOK_KODU=SP.STOK_KODU
      WHERE SP.FISNO=A.FATIRS_NO) AS PL_ADET
   FROM TBLSIPAMAS A
   JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK B ON A.FATIRS_NO=B.FATIRS_NO
   WHERE A.FTIRSIP=6
     AND B.KT_ROOTADI_6='${msg.netsisDataPayload.RootAdi}'
     AND D_YEDEK10=CONVERT(datetime, '${msg.netsisDataPayload.Sevk_Tarihi}', 103))
SELECT *
FROM A1
`;

 
msg.query=query;

return msg;

func:
msg.flowName = "Vehicle List1_0";

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `

-- Son 7 gn iinde olumu ya da olumam e-Fatura / e-rsaliye taslaklarnn sipari balantlarn listeler
DECLARE @StartDate DATE = DATEADD(DAY, -6, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE));
DECLARE @EndDate   DATE = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE);

WITH EFATURA_EIRSALIYE_TASLAKLAR AS (
    SELECT 
        F.CARI_KODU,
        F.FATIRS_NO,
        F.FTIRSIP,
        F.TARIH,
        F.TIPI,
        F.EBELGE,
        F.UPDATE_KODU,
        F.KAPATILMIS,
        E.DURUM,
        E.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
        C.CARI_ISIM
    FROM TBLFATUIRS F
    INNER JOIN TBLCASABIT C ON C.CARI_KOD = F.CARI_KODU
    LEFT JOIN TBLEFATURA E 
        ON E.FTIRSIP = F.FTIRSIP 
        AND E.FATIRS_NO = F.FATIRS_NO 
        AND (E.CARI_KODU = F.CARI_KODU OR E.CARI_KODU = F.CARI_KOD2)
),
BELGE AS (
    -- e-rsaliye
    SELECT 
        B.CARI_KODU,
        B.FATIRS_NO,
        B.DURUM,
        B.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
        B.CARI_ISIM,
        B.FTIRSIP
    FROM EFATURA_EIRSALIYE_TASLAKLAR B
    INNER JOIN TBLCASABITEK CT ON CT.CARI_KOD = B.CARI_KODU
    WHERE 
        B.FTIRSIP = '3'
        AND B.EBELGE = 1
        AND B.TARIH >= @StartDate
        AND B.TARIH < DATEADD(DAY, 1, @EndDate)
        AND B.TIPI <> 6
        AND (B.DURUM = 1 OR B.DURUM IS NULL)

    UNION ALL

    -- e-Fatura
    SELECT 
        B.CARI_KODU,
        B.FATIRS_NO,
        B.DURUM,
        B.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
        B.CARI_ISIM,
        B.FTIRSIP
    FROM EFATURA_EIRSALIYE_TASLAKLAR B
    WHERE 
        B.FTIRSIP = '1'
        AND B.TIPI <> '6'
        AND B.TARIH >= @StartDate
        AND B.TARIH < DATEADD(DAY, 1, @EndDate)
        AND B.UPDATE_KODU IS NULL
        AND ISNULL(B.KAPATILMIS, ' ') <> 'Z'
        AND (B.DURUM = 1 OR B.DURUM IS NULL)
),
SIPARIS_BILGILERI AS (
    SELECT 
        DISTINCT S.STHAR_SIPNUM,
        S.STHAR_ACIKLAMA,
        S.D_YEDEK10
    FROM BELGE B
    LEFT JOIN TBLSTHAR S 
        ON B.FATIRS_NO = S.FISNO 
       AND B.CARI_KODU = S.STHAR_ACIKLAMA 
       AND S.STHAR_SIPNUM IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT  DISTINCT 
    EK.KT_ROOTADI_6 AS RootAdi,
     
	CONVERT(varchar, S.D_YEDEK10, 103) Sevk_Tarihi
FROM SIPARIS_BILGILERI S
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK EK 
    ON S.STHAR_SIPNUM = EK.FATIRS_NO 
   AND S.STHAR_ACIKLAMA=EK.CARI_KODU


 
`;


msg.query = query;

return msg;

name: Get FatUst
func:
msg.flowName = "SendDocumentPrint1_0";

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = ` 


DECLARE @TargetRootadi NVARCHAR(100) = '${msg.payload.data.RootAdi}';
DECLARE @TargetSevkTarihi DATE = CONVERT(DATE, '${msg.payload.data.Sevk_Tarihi}', 103); -- dd/MM/yyyy
WITH EFATURA_EIRSALIYE_TASLAKLAR AS (
    SELECT 
        F.CARI_KODU,
        F.FATIRS_NO,
        F.FTIRSIP,
        F.TARIH,
        F.TIPI,
        F.EBELGE,
        F.UPDATE_KODU,
        F.KAPATILMIS,
        E.DURUM,
        E.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
        DBO.TRK(C.CARI_ISIM) CARI_ISIM,
		C.GRUP_KODU,
		dbo.TRK(C1.CARI_ISIM) TESLIM_CARI
    FROM TBLFATUIRS F
    INNER JOIN TBLCASABIT C ON C.CARI_KOD = F.CARI_KODU
    INNER JOIN TBLCASABIT C1 ON C1.CARI_KOD = F.CARI_KOD2
	
    LEFT JOIN TBLEFATURA E 
        ON E.FTIRSIP = F.FTIRSIP 
        AND E.FATIRS_NO = F.FATIRS_NO 
        AND (E.CARI_KODU = F.CARI_KODU OR E.CARI_KODU = F.CARI_KOD2)
		WHERE 	  F.TARIH >= DATEADD(DAY, -6, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
		AND F.TARIH < DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
	
),
BELGE AS (
    SELECT 
        B.CARI_KODU,
        B.FATIRS_NO,
        B.DURUM,
        B.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
        B.CARI_ISIM,
        B.FTIRSIP,
        B.TARIH,
		B.GRUP_KODU,
		B.TESLIM_CARI
    FROM EFATURA_EIRSALIYE_TASLAKLAR B
    WHERE (
        (B.FTIRSIP = '3' AND B.EBELGE = 1)
        OR B.FTIRSIP = '1'
    )
    AND B.TIPI <> 6 
    AND (B.DURUM = 1 OR B.DURUM IS NULL)
    AND (B.UPDATE_KODU IS NULL OR B.FTIRSIP = '3')
    AND (ISNULL(B.KAPATILMIS, ' ') <> 'Z' OR B.FTIRSIP = '3')
),
MATCHED_BELGELER AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        B.*
    FROM BELGE B
    INNER JOIN TBLSTHAR S 
        ON B.FATIRS_NO = S.FISNO 
       AND B.CARI_KODU = S.STHAR_ACIKLAMA 
       AND S.STHAR_SIPNUM IS NOT NULL
    INNER JOIN TBLSIPAMASSAHAEK EK
        ON S.STHAR_SIPNUM = EK.FATIRS_NO 
       AND S.STHAR_ACIKLAMA = EK.CARI_KODU
    WHERE 
        EK.KT_ROOTADI_6 = @TargetRootadi
        AND CONVERT(DATE, S.D_YEDEK10) = @TargetSevkTarihi
)
SELECT 
    M.CARI_KODU,
    M.FATIRS_NO BELGE_NO,
    DBO.TRK(M.CARI_ISIM) CARI_ISIM,
	M.TESLIM_CARI ,
    M.FTIRSIP,        
    M.GIB_FATIRS_NO,
	M.GRUP_KODU
	
FROM MATCHED_BELGELER M
ORDER BY M.TARIH DESC;




 
`;


msg.query = query;

return msg;
